title: JSW Neo Energy bags 300MW wind-solar hybrid project from NTPC
description: JSW Energy's arm, JSW Neo Energy, has secured a Letter of Award from NTPC for a 300 MW wind-solar hybrid project, raising its total locked-in generation capacity to 16.7 GW. The firm aims to reach 20 GW capacity by 2030.
